about_the_game:
You meet a beautiful young woman in a nice modern flat. She is excited and asks you to love her. She requests constantly new and exciting love positions, and you have 24 different positions to choose from. She asks for new positions by sending short messages on the screen, and you have to find the right one, which fits to the wish of the woman. If you select the right position in twenty seconds the woman gets more and more excited. Be careful, if your selection is not the right one, the woman will not be satisfied and her mood and excitement will go bad in a minute. But if your fantasy and experience is rich enough, she will enjoy your company and will tell you how much she loves you.
In the game you can see 24 different positions grouped around 9 different love themes with detailed 3D graphics and freely adjustable animation speed.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains detailed graphical depiction of different love positions using lifelike 3D graphics.

name: Naughty Girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Try to amuse a beautiful but naughty woman, who requests constantly new and exciting love positions. Be careful, because if you cannot fulfill her wishes quickly, her mood and excitement will go bad in a minute.
